Package entity

Class Ship

java.lang.Object
entity.Entity
entity.Ship
public class Ship
extends Entity
Implements a ship, to be controlled by the player.
Author:
Roberto Izquierdo Amo

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Ship​(int positionX, int positionY, Color color)
    Constructor, establishes the ship's properties.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void destroy()
    Switches the ship to its destroyed state.
    int getSpeed()
    Getter for the ship's speed.
    boolean isDestroyed()
    Checks if the ship is destroyed.
    void moveLeft()
    Moves the ship speed units left, or until the left screen border is reached.
    void moveRight()
    Moves the ship speed uni ts right, or until the right screen border is reached.
    boolean shoot​(Set<Bullet> bullets)
    Shoots a bullet upwards.
    void update()
    Updates status of the ship.

    Methods inherited from class entity.Entity

    getColor, getHeight, getPositionX, getPositionY, getSpriteType, getWidth, setPositionX, setPositionY

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Ship

      public Ship​(int positionX, int positionY, Color color)
      Constructor, establishes the ship's properties.
      Parameters:
      positionX - Initial position of the ship in the X axis.
      positionY - Initial position of the ship in the Y axis.

  • Method Details

    • moveRight

      public final void moveRight()
      Moves the ship speed uni ts right, or until the right screen border is reached.

    • moveLeft

      public final void moveLeft()
      Moves the ship speed units left, or until the left screen border is reached.

    • shoot

      public final boolean shoot​(Set<Bullet> bullets)
      Shoots a bullet upwards.
      Parameters:
      bullets - List of bullets on screen, to add the new bullet.
      Returns:
      Checks if the bullet was shot correctly.

    • update

      public final void update()
      Updates status of the ship.

    • destroy

      public final void destroy()
      Switches the ship to its destroyed state.

    • isDestroyed

      public final boolean isDestroyed()
      Checks if the ship is destroyed.
      Returns:
      True if the ship is currently destroyed.

    • getSpeed

      public final int getSpeed()
      Getter for the ship's speed.
      Returns:
      Speed of the ship.
